content: अकर्मन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Without work, idle; inefficient. {@--2@} Disqualified for performing the necessary rites, wicked, degraded; अकर्मा दस्युरभि नो <ls>Rv. 10. 22. 8.</ls> {@--3@} (Gram.) Intransitive, generally in this sense अकर्मक. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (र्म) {@--1@} Absence of work; absence of necessary observances; neglect of essential observances; inaction; कर्मणो ह्यपि बोद्धव्यं बोद्धव्यं च विकर्मणः . अकर्मणश्च बोद्धव्यं गहना कर्मणो गतिः <ls>Bg. 4. 17</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 4.">18.</ls> {@--2@} An improper act; crime, sin.
